TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateUserWizard extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard

summary.span: 提供用於建立新的網站使用者帳戶的使用者介面。

span.span: Provides a user interface for creating new Web site user accounts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [建立使用者Creating a User](#creating_a_user) - [樣式和範本Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [驗證群組Validation Grouping](#validation_grouping) - [使用版面配置範本Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項提供的使用者介面會與您的網站的使用者資料存放區資料存放區中建立新的使用者帳戶進行通訊的物件。The control provides the user interface for the object that communicates with your Web site's user data store to create new user accounts in the data store. 依賴來建立使用者，並且如有必要，停用它們。The relies on the to create the user and disable them if necessary. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 登入控制項，您可能會覺得很有幫助讀取[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with ASP.NET login controls, you might find it helpful to read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 根據預設，控制項將會接受使用者名稱和密碼，來自網站訪客。By default, the control will accept a user name and password from the Web site visitor. 根據站台的需求物件控制項將會選擇性地接受電子郵件地址，由屬性，以及密碼復原確認問題與解答，由和。Based on the requirements of the site's object, the control will optionally accept an email address, represented by the property, and a password recovery confirmation question and answer, represented by and . 資料表顯示的所有必要和選擇性控制項，請參閱。For a table showing all required and optional controls for , see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果設`true`和屬性已設定應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中，您可能無法產生密碼未通過規則運算式強度測試。If is set to `true` and the property is set in the application's Web.config file, you could potentially generate a password that does not pass the regular expression strength test. 在此情況下，建立使用者，會引發錯誤，指出密碼無效。In this case, creating a user raises an error that indicates an invalid password. ## 建立使用者Creating a User 當使用者建立與，與目前互動控制項來完成下列工作順序。When a user is created with the , the control interacts with the current to accomplish the following tasks in order. 1. 建立密碼，設`true`。Create a password if is set to `true`. 2. 在資料存放區中建立使用者代表。Create the user in the data store that the represents. 3. 停用存放區中的使用者，如果屬性設定為 `true.`Disable the user in the store if the property is set to `true.` 您可以擴充控制項來加入其他欄位，或加入額外的步驟之前或之後在提供的範本接受其他資訊和屬性。You can extend the control to accept additional information by adding additional fields, or by adding additional steps before or after the provided templates in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 步驟是中的第一個步驟控制項，然後是必要的步驟。The step is the first step within the control, and is a required step. 根據預設，屬性設定為`false`讓使用者從返回步驟並不小心嘗試使用相同的認證建立另一個使用者帳戶。By default, the property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果設`false`、屬性不會保留在檢視狀態，而且必須維護應用程式中包含邏輯值。If is set to `false`, the property is not maintained in view state and you must include logic in your application to maintain the value. 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項文字方塊中所引發的事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event raised by the text boxes. 控制項可以選擇性地傳送電子郵件訊息給新使用者如果您已設定 SMTP 郵件伺服器傳送電子郵件。The control can optionally send email messages to new users if you have configured an SMTP mail server to send email. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 控制項使用網際網路電子郵件服務登入資訊傳送給使用者。The control uses Internet email services to send login information to users. 沒有固有的安全性風險，傳送電子郵件中的密碼。There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email. 您應該判斷是否可以接受您的網站將這些安全性風險。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. ## 樣式和範本Styles and Templates 當控制項未自訂範本，屬性控制項套用至控制項中的第一個文字方塊和屬性會套用到所有文字方塊控制項。When the control is not customized with templates, the property of the control applies to the first text box in the control and the property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control. 如果控制項自訂範本，然後在屬性和屬性會被忽略。If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在此情況下，直接設定屬性和每個範本子控制項的屬性。In this case, directly set the property and the property of each template child control. 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性和，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項文字方塊中所引發的事件。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event raised by the text boxes. > [!NOTE] > 設定， ，或屬性重新建立的子控制項控制項和其控制項中處理程序將會遺失狀態。Setting the , , or property recreates the child controls of the control, and their control state is lost in the process. 若要避免這種情況下，明確地維持控制項狀態的控制項的子控制項，或避免讓範本內部的控制項。To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the control's child controls, or avoid putting controls inside of templates. 下表列出控制樣式屬性，並說明每個樣式屬性會影響哪些 UI 項目。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 如需哪些屬性的每個樣式套用至清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性的文件。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|受影響的 UI 項目UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||**繼續** 按鈕。**Continue** button.| ||**建立使用者** 按鈕。**Create User** button.| ||連結至其他網頁。Links to other pages.| ||告訴使用者如何使用控制項的頁面上的指示文字。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有輸入的欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文字項目輸入的欄位。Text entry input fields.| ||每個檢視的標題文字。Title text for each view.| ||密碼復原或重設嘗試成功時，對使用者顯示的文字。Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| ||當成員資格提供者無法建立新的使用者帳戶時，出現錯誤訊息。Error messages when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.| ||描述密碼需求的文字。The text that describes password requirements.| ||與驗證相關聯的錯誤訊息。Error messages associated with validation.| ## 驗證群組Validation Grouping 控制項使用的驗證群組，以便與相同的頁面上其他欄位個別驗證控制項。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 根據預設，屬性控制項當做驗證群組名稱。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，識別碼為"CreateUserWizard1"的控制項將會使用"CreateUserWizard1 」 的驗證群組名稱。For example, a control with the ID "CreateUserWizard1" will use a validation group name of "CreateUserWizard1". 如果您想要設定的驗證群組控制項是的一部分，您必須將控制項樣板和變更的驗證群組名稱。If you want to set the validation group that the control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name. 請注意，類別繼承自類別，不支援特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈現的非標準或 quirks 模式。Note that the class inherits from the class, which does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode. 不會嘗試最佳化的非標準的 Internet Explorer 模式呈現。The does not attempt to optimize rendering for non-standard Internet Explorer mode. 若要取得最佳的 Internet Explorer 轉譯使用控制，請使用 XHTML 文件類型，它會根據預設，Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中加入。To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio. ## 使用版面配置範本Formatting Using Layout Templates 控制項可讓您指定控制項的配置，而不需要您使用 HTML`table`項目。The control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element. 相反地，您可以使用`LayoutTemplate`項目來指定版面配置。Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout. 在版面配置範本中，您建立預留位置，表示其中的項目應該以動態方式插入控制項的控制項。In the layout template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control. (這是類似於如何範本模型控制運作。)如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。(This is similar to how the template model for the control works.) For more information, see the property. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用其基本形式的控制。The first code example shows how to use the control in its basic form. 此頁面將會建立新的網站使用者帳戶，站台的預設值物件。This page will create a new Web site user account with the site's default object. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardBasic/CS/createuserwizardbasiccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardBasic/VB/createuserwizardbasicvb.aspx#1)] 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項的預設範本。The second code example shows how to use the control with the default templates. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardFullTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardFullTemplate/CS/createuserwizardfulltemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardFullTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardFullTemplate/VB/createuserwizardfulltemplatevb.aspx#1)] 第三個程式碼範例會加入額外的步驟來控制項，並使用事件，以儲存使用者的名字和姓氏個人化的內容中。The third code example adds an additional step to the control and uses the event to store the user's first and last name in personalization properties. 程式碼範例需要在 Web.config 檔案中的下列項目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的成員資格提供者屬性會決定是否在執行階段顯示的問題與解答文字方塊。The membership provider specified in the property will determine whether the question and answer text boxes are displayed at run time. 如果回應中指定的成員資格提供者所需屬性，則 [回應] 文字方塊中會出現在控制項。If an answer is required by the membership provider specified in the property, then the answer text box will appear on the control. 顯示在每個文字方塊控制項有與其相關聯的物件。Each text box displayed on the control has a object associated with it. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會修改中的電子郵件訊息来傳送給新使用者的訊息中包含使用者的密碼復原確認回應事件。The following code example modifies the email message in the event to include the user's password recovery confirmation answer in the message that is sent to new users. [!code-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/CustomCreateUserWizard.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/CustomCreateUserWizard.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的 Web 網頁`CustomCreateUserWizard`。The following code example demonstrates a Web page that uses the `CustomCreateUserWizard`. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/createuserwizardonsendingmailcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/createuserwizardonsendingmailvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性讓您能夠建立使用者帳戶，而不需為他們輸入密碼。The property makes it possible to create user accounts without entering a password for them. 比方說，這項功能時，系統管理員會建立新的使用者帳戶，並接著將密碼提供給使用者。For example, this functionality is useful when an administrator creates a new user's account and then gives a password to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您無法建立使用者使用如果設`true`和應用程式的 Web.config 中設定屬性。將會產生錯誤訊息，指出密碼無效。You cannot create users using the if is set to `true` and the property is set in the application's Web.config. An error message indicating an invalid password will result.

summary.span: 發生於成員資格提供者建立新的網站使用者帳戶之後。

span.span: Occurs after the membership provider has created the new Web site user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成員資格提供者引發事件屬性會建立新的網站使用者帳戶。The event is raised after the membership provider specified in the property creates the new Web site user account. 如果屬性是`true`，使用者登入後的網站事件。If the property is `true`, the user is logged on to the Web site after the event. 使用事件以設定網站的值，例如個人化的值之前在使用者登入至站台的第一次。Use the event to set Web site values, such as personalization values, before the user is logged on to the site for the first time. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件，以儲存使用者的名字和姓氏個人化的內容中。The following code example uses the event to store the user's first and last name in personalization properties. 程式碼範例需要在 Web.config 檔案中的下列項目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的外觀**Create User**按鈕控制項。The property defines the appearance of the **Create User** button in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CreateUserButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在套用任何設定屬性覆寫中的對應設定控制項。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含顯示的文字控制項的**Create User** 按鈕。The property contains the text displayed for the control's **Create User** button. 值而定屬性，屬性可顯示為文字的按鈕，以替代映像，或連結的文字顯示的文字。Depending on the value of the property, the property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link. 下表列出屬性值和其各自效果**Create User**按鈕的文字標題。The following table lists property values and their respective effects on the **Create User** button's text caption. 文字會出現在按鈕上。Text appears on the button. 文字會顯示為影像的替代文字。Text appears as alternative text for the image. 文字會顯示為連結。Text appears as a link. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成員資格提供者時，將會引發在伺服器上的事件屬性無法建立指定的使用者帳戶。The event is raised on the server when the membership provider specified in the property fails to create the specified user account. 錯誤處理常式會傳遞物件，其中包含從成員資格提供者失敗的詳細資料。The error handler is passed a object that contains the details of the failure from the membership provider. 如需可能的錯誤狀況的清單，請參閱。For a list of the possible error conditions, see . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的帳戶建立步驟控制項。The property defines the account creation step of a control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性物件傳回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that returns. 下表列出使用樣板化的內容時所支援的必要和選擇性控制項。The following table lists the required and optional controls that are supported when using templated content for the . |識別碼或命令名稱ID or command name|控制項類型Control type|必要/選用Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|必要Required| |`Password`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|若設`false`。Required if is set to `false`.| |`Email`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|若是 `true.`Required if is `true.`| |`ConfirmPassword`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|沒有需求No requirements| |`Question`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|選擇項，除非所需的成員資格。Optional unless required by membership.| |`Answer`|實作的任何控制項，包括，或自訂或協力廠商控制項。Any control that implements , including , or a custom or third-party control.|選擇項，除非所需的成員資格。Optional unless required by membership.| |`ErrorMessage`|實作的任何控制項。Any control that implements .|OptionalOptional| |`CreateUser`|造成事件反昇任何控制項Any control that causes event bubbling|OptionalOptional| |`Cancel`|任何Any|OptionalOptional| 如果屬性設定為`true`，而且您使用樣板化的內容，控制項無須;控制項會擲回例外狀況，如果控制找不到，或是類型錯誤。If the property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the control is required; the control throws an exception if the control is not found or is of the wrong type. 如果設`false`，如果將會擲回任何例外狀況找不到控制項。If is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the control is not found. 如果控制項是錯誤的型別，則會忽略它。If the control is of the wrong type, it is ignored. 同樣地，如果成員資格提供者需要問題與解答 (取決於屬性)，則和控制項所需和擲回例外狀況，如果找不到，或者屬於錯誤的類型。Similarly, if a membership provider requires a question and answer (determined by the property), the and controls are required and the throws an exception if they are not found or are of the wrong type. 如果它們不需要的成員資格提供者，如果它們找不到，而且如果它們都是錯誤的型別便會予以忽略，會擲不回任何例外狀況。If they are not required by the membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，然後才呼叫方法中指定的成員資格提供者上屬性。The event is raised prior to calling the method on the membership provider specified in the property. 使用事件，以建立預設值，或修改使用者輸入再將資訊傳遞至成員資格提供者的資訊。Use the event to establish defaults or modify the information entered by the user before passing the information to the membership provider. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件進行屬性中指定的成員資格提供者來送出之前全部小寫屬性。The following code example uses the event to make the property all lowercase before submitting it to the membership provider specified in the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatingUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatingUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatingusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatingUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatingUser/VB/createuserwizardcreatinguservb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否新建立的使用者帳戶將會標示為停用的成員資格資料存放區中。The property determines if the newly created user account will be marked as disabled in the membership data store. 當使用者帳戶會標示為停用時，不允許帳戶登入網站。When user accounts are marked as disabled, the accounts are not allowed to log on to the Web site. 例如，如果您的網站允許新的使用者要求的帳戶，但是需要系統管理核准才能存取，設定屬性`true`停用新建立的帳戶，直到系統管理員核准的帳戶。For example, if your Web site allows new users to request an account, but requires administrative approval before allowing access, set the property to `true` to disable newly created accounts until an administrator approves the account. 當是`true`，您應該設定屬性`false`以便不會嘗試將新的使用者登入。When is `true`, you should set the property to `false` so that the does not attempt to log on the new user. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 取得或設定規則運算式，用於驗證提供的電子郵件地址。

span.span: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided email address.

value.span: 字串，包含用來驗證電子郵件地址的規則運算式。

span.span: A string containing the regular expression used to validate an email address.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用使用者確認其符合特定模式所輸入的屬性來指定驗證電子郵件地址的規則運算式。Use the property to specify a regular expression that validates the email address entered by the user to confirm that it matches a specific pattern. 常見的用法是確定使用者已輸入的完整電子郵件地址，例如** user@contoso.com **。除了任何之限制電子郵件地址中指定的成員資格提供者所使用規則運算式屬性。A common use is to make sure that the user has entered a complete email address, such as **user@contoso.com**. The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the email address by the membership provider specified in the property. 如果成員資格提供者會拒絕電子郵件地址，因為任何原因，文字會包含在顯示屬性。If the membership provider rejects the email address for any reason, the text contained in the property is displayed. 如果只有位址比較的規則運算式屬性設定為`true`。The address is only compared to the regular expression if the property is set to `true`. 如果電子郵件地址未通過的規則運算式，文字會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If the email address does not pass the regular expression, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將指派的規則運算式屬性，以確定使用者輸入的電子郵件地址格式無效，例如** username@contoso.com **。The following code example assigns a regular expression to the property to make sure that the user entered their email address in a valid format, such as **username@contoso.com**. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardEmailRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardEmailRegex/CS/createuserwizardemailregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardEmailRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardEmailRegex/VB/createuserwizardemailregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来變更的成員資格提供者無法建立新的使用者帳戶時，會顯示錯誤訊息的外觀屬性。Use the property to change the appearance of error messages that are displayed when the membership provider fails to create a new user account. 根據預設，設定以紅色顯示下列訊息：By default, the is set to display the following messages in red: - - - - - - - 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`). 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 會套用任何設定屬性覆寫的屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings that are applied in the property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義中的標籤外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance of labels in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `LabelStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `LabelStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LabelStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LabelStyle.ForeColor`). 屬性會定義下列屬性的外觀：The property defines the appearance of the following properties: - - - - - - 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在套用任何設定屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以設定為`false`如果您想要建立使用者帳戶，但不是會在建立之後，驗證的帳戶。The property can be set to `false` if you want to create a user account but not authenticate the account after it is created. 如果您是建立使用者帳戶，例如，系統管理員，或如果使用者可以存取的網站之前的等待期間，這可能是很有用。This might be useful if you are an administrator creating user accounts, for example, or if there is a waiting period before users can access the Web site. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定為`true`，使用者會建立並登入的結尾步驟。When the property is set to `true`, the user will be created and logged in at the end of the step. 如果您想讓使用者登入已完成所有步驟之後，您可以設定屬性`false`直到所有的步驟控制項都已都完成。If you want the user to be logged in after all the steps have been completed, you can set the property to `false` until all of the steps of the control are completed. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 取得屬性集合的參考，這些屬性定義傳送至新使用者之電子郵件訊息的特性。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of the email message sent to new users.

value.span: 若要參考物件，定義電子郵件訊息傳送至新的使用者。

span.span: A reference to a object that defines the email message sent to a new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回一組您用來定義格式的屬性和內容傳送給新使用者的電子郵件訊息的參考。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message that is sent to new users. 一般設定包括主旨和寄件者回覆地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 如需完整的屬性清單，請參閱類別。For a complete list of properties, see the class. 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以設定屬性在表單中以宣告方式`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。You can set the properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.SubProperty`(例如， `MailDefinition.Subject`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.SubProperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`). 電子郵件訊息傳送至新的使用者才不`null`如果不是空的或`null`。An email message is sent to new users only if is not `null` and if is not empty or `null`. 在此情況下，就會引發事件，並嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息。In that case, the event is raised and an attempt is made to send the email message. 屬性必須設定為電子郵件地址。The property must be set to an email address. 否則，擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, an exception is thrown. 從電子郵件訊息建立時物件，它會使下表所列的替代項目。When the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions listed in the following table. |替代文字Substitution text|取代為Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |`<%UserName%>`|新建立的使用者帳戶的使用者名稱。The user name of the newly created user account.| |`<%Password%>`|新建立的使用者帳戶的密碼。The password for the newly created user account.| 如果屬性物件是`true`，郵件訊息的內容將會是 HTML 編碼的訊息收件者防止跨網站指令碼的安全性弱點。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. 您可以使用方法，以修改由物件。You can use the method to modify the created by the object. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). > [!NOTE] > 不保證會接收使用者，或檢視電子郵件訊息。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要確認使用者已收到通知，透過電子郵件，請考慮提供確認連結，可讓使用者確認收到通知的電子郵件訊息中。To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the email message that enables the user to confirm that the notification was received. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性的屬性可以使用宣告式和以程式設計方式的語法。The following code example sets properties of the property by using both declarative and programmatic syntax. 這個程式碼範例需要名為 MailFile.txt 包含下列文字的文字檔案。This code example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ``` Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/CS/createuserwizardmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/VB/createuserwizardmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，當使用者按一下**繼續**按鈕控制項。The event is raised when the user clicks the **Continue** button on the control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網站使用者帳戶建立成員資格提供者之後，呼叫方法。The method is called after the Web site user account is created by the membership provider. 如果屬性是`true`，使用者會登入之後方法呼叫。If the property is `true`, the user is logged in after the method is called. 使用方法，以設定網站的值，例如個人化屬性，使用者第一次登入之前。Use the method to set Web site values, such as personalization properties, before the user is logged in for the first time. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來執行動作傳送至新的使用者資訊之前所需的任何處理方法中指定的成員資格提供者屬性。Use the method to do any processing required before sending the new user information to the method of the membership provider specified in the property. 比方說，您可能會將使用者名稱欄位設為小寫字母，或比較之前允許的使用者帳戶建立電子郵件地址，以限制的地址清單。For example, you might set the user name field to all lowercase letters, or compare the email address to a list of restricted addresses before allowing creation of the user account. 如果您要取消的要求建立新的使用者帳戶、 設定屬性物件傳遞為`e`參數`true`。If you need to cancel the request to create the new user account, set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義自訂使用控制項方法以進行全部小寫的屬性。The following code example defines a custom control that uses the method to make the property all lowercase. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以修改傳送給新使用者的電子郵件訊息。Use the method to modify the email message sent to new users. 屬性物件傳遞為`e`參數包含會傳送給新使用者的物件。The property of the object passed as the `e` parameter contains the object that will be sent to the new user. 修改的屬性物件以修改電子郵件訊息。Modify the properties of the object to modify the email message. 電子郵件訊息時，會只建立屬性所指定物件屬性會指向有效的檔案名稱。Email messages are only created when the property of the object specified by the property points to a valid file name. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義自訂使用控制項方法，以修改傳送給新使用者的電子郵件文字。The following code example defines a custom control that uses the method to modify the text of the email sent to new users. 這個範例需要名為 MailFile.txt 包含下列文字的文字檔案。This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ```csharp Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/CS/createuserwizardonsendingmailcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendingMail/VB/createuserwizardonsendingmailvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks SMTP 郵件系統會引發例外狀況時傳送電子郵件給新使用者時，呼叫方法。The method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send email to the new user. 檢查屬性物件傳遞為`e`參數，來判斷實際造成例外狀況。Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 最常見的問題是中的組態錯誤``Web.config 檔案區段。The most common problem is a configuration error in the `` section of the Web.config file. 您必須設定屬性物件傳遞為`e`發出信號的例外狀況造成參數来呼叫的方法已被處理，否則是重新擲回例外狀況。You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to signal that the exception that caused the method to be called has been taken care of, otherwise the exception is re-thrown. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義自訂物件，記錄檔傳送電子郵件至特定站台的記錄函式的錯誤。The following code example defines a custom object that logs email errors to a site-specific logging function. [!code-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/CS/CustomCreateUserWizard.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/VB/CustomCreateUserWizard.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的 Web 網頁`CustomCreateUserWizard`。The following code example demonstrates a Web page that uses the `CustomCreateUserWizard`. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/CS/createuserwizardonsendmailerrorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardOnSendMailError/VB/createuserwizardonsendmailerrorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義的描述中的密碼需求的文字外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance of the text that describes password requirements in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`). 屬性定義的外觀屬性。The property defines the appearance of the property. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在套用任何設定屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性以提供有關如何建立密碼的指導方針和使用者的需求。You can use the property to provide guidelines and requirements for the user on how to create a password. 例如，您可以設定屬性，以 「 您的密碼必須至少為六個字元長。 」For example, you could set the property to "Your password must be at least six characters long." 然後您可以使用屬性來驗證使用者輸入的密碼符合的指導方針。You can then use the property to validate that the user entered a password that conforms to the guidelines. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 取得或設定規則運算式，用於驗證提供的密碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided password.

value.span: 包含規則運算式的字串，用於驗證提供的密碼。

span.span: A string containing the regular expression used to validate the provided password.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可定義用來驗證您的網站上的使用者密碼的需求。Use the property to define the requirements for passwords used to validate users on your Web site. 常見用法是以確認使用者具有包含非字母符號，密碼，以讓讓攻擊者難以猜測的密碼。A common use is to make sure that a user has included symbols other than letters in a password to make it harder for attackers to guess a password. 除了任何限制的密碼中指定的成員資格提供者所使用規則運算式屬性。The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the password by the membership provider specified in the property. 如果成員資格提供者會拒絕密碼，因為任何原因，文字會包含在顯示屬性。If the membership provider rejects the password for any reason, the text contained in the property is displayed. 如果輸入的密碼無法通過的規則運算式時，錯誤訊息會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If the password entered does not pass the regular expression, the error message contained in the property is displayed to the user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來定義規則運算式，會檢查密碼，以確保它們：The following code example uses the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they: - 已超過七個字元。Are longer than seven characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合這些準則，文字會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet these criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardPasswordRegex/CS/createuserwizardpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardPasswordRegex/VB/createuserwizardpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`、會顯示一個文字方塊和使用者輸入電子郵件地址相關聯的標籤。When the property is `true`, the will display a text box and an associated label for the user to enter an email address. 如果使用者未輸入電子郵件地址屬性會顯示錯誤訊息。If the user does not enter an email address, the property will display an error message. 如果屬性設定為`true`，而且您使用樣板化的內容，控制項無須和擲回例外狀況，如果控制找不到，或是類型錯誤。If the property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the control is required and the throws an exception if the control is not found or is of the wrong type. 如果設`false`，如果將會擲回任何例外狀況找不到。If is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the is not found. 如果它是錯誤的型別，則會忽略它。If it is of the wrong type, it is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的成員資格提供者屬性為新的使用者需要唯一的電子郵件地址，則必須將屬性`true`，因此會顯示輸入電子郵件地址的 UI。If the membership provider specified in the property requires a unique email address for new users, you must set the property to `true` so that the UI for entering an email address is displayed. 否則，使用者會看到但沒有方法可以輸入電子郵件地址。Otherwise, the user will see the but have no way to enter an email address. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 發生於將已建立帳戶的電子郵件確認傳送至使用者之前。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that an account has been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別將會傳送電子郵件確認確認新的網站帳戶已建立時屬性會定義要傳送電子郵件訊息。The class will send an email message confirming that a new Web site account has been created when the property defines an email message to send. 由於電子郵件訊息只有自動取代使用者名稱和密碼欄位的欄位，您可以使用修改電子郵件訊息傳送給新的使用者之前的事件。Because the email message only has automatic replacement fields for the user name and password fields, you can use the event to modify the email message before it is sent to the new user. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用修改傳送給新使用者的電子郵件訊息的事件。The following code example uses the event to modify the email message that is sent to new users. 這個範例需要名為 MailFile.txt 包含下列文字的文字檔案。This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text. ```csharp Your account was set up on our Web site with the following: Username: <%UserName%> To reset your password, you must answer the following question: Password Question: <%PasswordQuestion%> Password Answer: <%PasswordAnswer%> Thank you for creating an account with our Web site. ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/CS/createuserwizardmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardMailDefinition/VB/createuserwizardmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於傳送電子郵件給新使用者而出現 SMTP 錯誤時。

span.span: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending email to the new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 問題，使用新的使用者所提供的電子郵件地址傳送電子郵件的 SMTP 郵件提供者時，會引發事件。The event is raised when there is a problem using the SMTP mail provider to send email to the email address provided by the new user. 最常見的原因，才能引發此事件是當``Web.config 檔案區段不正確。The most common reason to raise this event is when the `` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 預設值事件處理常式不會攔截或處理電子郵件系統的 SMTP 錯誤。The default event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the email system. 您事件處理常式必須設定屬性物件`true`才能停止網站使用者所出現的錯誤。Your event handler must set the property of the object to `true` in order to stop the error from appearing to the Web site user. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是的處理常式呼叫特定站台的程序，以電子郵件錯誤記錄的事件。The following code example is a handler for the event that calls a site-specific procedure to log the email error. 屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理此錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardSendMailError/CS/createuserwizardsendmailerrorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardSendMailError#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardSendMailError/VB/createuserwizardsendmailerrorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用可以略過 [資訊看板] 區域的內容讓螢幕助讀程式讀取屬性來指定隱藏影像的替代文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden-image read by screen readers that will provide the ability to skip the sidebar area's content. 您指定的文字會提供具有描述可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的隱藏影像的輔助技術裝置。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`false`（預設）、屬性不會建立隱藏的影像的替代文字。If the property is set to `false` (the default), the property does not create a hidden image with alternate text. 屬性的運作方式時，才屬性是`true`。The property works only when the property is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性定義中的文字方塊控制項的外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance of text box controls in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 屬性會定義下列文字方塊控制項的外觀：The property defines the appearance of the following text box controls: - 文字方塊欄位 text box field - 文字方塊欄位 text box field - 文字方塊欄位 text box field - 文字方塊欄位 text box field - 文字方塊欄位 text box field 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在套用任何設定屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義標題中的外觀控制項。The property defines the appearance of titles in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object that it returns. 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性類別 (例如， `TitleTextStyle-ForeColor`)。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TitleTextStyle-ForeColor`). 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TitleTextStyle.ForeColor`)。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TitleTextStyle.ForeColor`). 屬性會定義標題的外觀上步驟和步驟。The property defines the appearance of the title on the step and the step. 樣式設定屬性會與樣式設定合併控制項。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在套用任何設定屬性覆寫屬性中的對應設定控制項。Any settings applied in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 下列樣式屬性會覆寫設定：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - 不過，當您使用範本來定義外觀控制項，屬性沒有任何作用。However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect.
